name: Chaos Shuffle
description:
CHaos SHuffle.
A rouguelike dungeon crawler with an absurd amount of environment effects.
Defeat all the enemies in a room, collect their money, and advance onwards. At 15 second intervals, a new "card" will be drawn from a deck, and the description on that card will immediately come into effect.
Some cards stack on each other, while others cancel each other out.

All art assets minus some card pictures were drawn during the game jam time
Sounds and background tracks are freeware from freesound.org.

Controls:
WASD to move.
Left click to shoot, Mouse to aim.
E to open shop next to shopkeeper.
